channel.title: Talks on Cris Silva
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on Cris Silva

item.title: The importance of biotech ecosystem in Sri Lanka
item.description: In this podcast we discussed the importance of developing an ecosystem for biotechnology innovaton to foster the bioeconomy innovation and startups in Sri Lanka.

item.title: Why we are building a scientific community in Sri Lanka
item.description: In this podcast we discussed our work in Benzyme Ventures and why it is important!
